mil5.3.3:3.1_0: Puna ca tathāgato catunnaṁ parisānaṁ majjhe nisīditvā purato devamanussānaṁ selassa brāhmaṇassa kosohitaṁ vatthaguyhaṁ dassesi.
mil5.3.3:3.3_1: tena hi selassa brāhmaṇassa kosohitaṁ vatthaguyhaṁ dassesīti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.3.3:3.4_0: Yadi selassa brāhmaṇassa kosohitaṁ vatthaguyhaṁ dassesi,
mil5.3.3:3.4_1: tena hi ‘kāyena saṁvaro sādhū’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.3.3:3.5_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.3:4.1_2: selassa ca brāhmaṇassa kosohitaṁ vatthaguyhaṁ dassitaṁ.
mil5.3.3:4.2_0: Yassa kho, mahārāja, tathāgate kaṅkhā uppannā,
mil5.3.3:4.2_1: tassa bodhanatthāya bhagavā iddhiyā tappaṭibhāgaṁ kāyaṁ dasseti,
mil5.3.3:5.1_1: yaṁ parisagato ekoyeva taṁ guyhaṁ passati,
mil5.3.3:5.2_0: Iṅgha me tvaṁ tattha kāraṇaṁ upadisa, kāraṇena maṁ saññāpehī”ti.
mil5.3.3:5.5_0: “Api nu kho sā, mahārāja, parisā passatetaṁ vedanaṁ,
mil5.3.3:5.6_0: “Na hi, bhante, attanā yeva so, bhante, puriso vedayatī”ti.
mil5.3.3:5.7_2: tasseva tathāgato bodhanatthāya iddhiyā tappaṭibhāgaṁ kāyaṁ dasseti,
mil5.3.3:6.1_1: kañcideva purisaṁ bhūto āviseyya, api nu kho sā, mahārāja,
mil5.3.3:6.2_1: soyeva āturo tassa bhūtassa āgamanaṁ passatī”ti.
mil5.3.3:6.3_2: tasseva tathāgato bodhanatthāya iddhiyā tappaṭibhāgaṁ kāyaṁ dasseti,
mil5.3.3:7.1_0: “Dukkaraṁ, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā kataṁ, yaṁ ekassapi adassanīyaṁ, taṁ dassentenā”ti.
mil5.3.3:7.3_1: diṭṭhāya diṭṭhaṁyeva hoti guyhaṁ, yaṁ disvā niṭṭhaṁ gato”ti.
mil5.3.3:7.6_2: tasmā tathāgato yena yena yogena bodhaneyyā bujjhanti,
mil5.3.3:8.1_1: bhisakko sallakatto yena yena bhesajjena āturo arogo hoti,
mil5.3.3:8.1_2: tena tena bhesajjena āturaṁ upasaṅkamati, vamanīyaṁ vameti, virecanīyaṁ vireceti, anulepanīyaṁ anulimpeti, anuvāsanīyaṁ anuvāseti;
mil5.3.3:8.2_1: tathāgato yena yena yogena bodhaneyyā sattā bujjhanti, tena tena yogena bodheti.
mil5.3.3:9.1_1: itthī mūḷhagabbhā bhisakkassa adassanīyaṁ guyhaṁ dasseti;
mil5.3.3:9.2_1: tathāgato bodhaneyye satte bodhetuṁ adassanīyaṁ guyhaṁ iddhiyā chāyaṁ dassesi.
mil5.3.3:9.4_2: tassapi bhagavā yogena hadayaṁ dasseyya, yogaññū, mahārāja, tathāgato desanākusalo.
mil5.3.3:10.1_1: tathāgato therassa nandassa adhimuttiṁ jānitvā taṁ devabhavanaṁ netvā devakaññāyo dassesi ‘imināyaṁ kulaputto bujjhissatī’ti, tena ca so kulaputto bujjhi.
mil5.3.3:10.2_1: tathāgato anekapariyāyena subhanimittaṁ hīḷento garahanto jigucchanto tassa bodhanahetu kakuṭapādiniyo accharāyo dassesi.
mil5.3.3:11.1_1: tathāgato therassa cūḷapanthakassa bhātarā nikkaḍḍhitassa dukkhitassa dummanassa upagantvā sukhumaṁ coḷakhaṇḍaṁ adāsi ‘imināyaṁ kulaputto bujjhissatī’ti,
mil5.3.3:11.1_2: so ca kulaputto tena kāraṇena jinasāsane vasībhāvaṁ pāpuṇi.
mil5.3.3:12.1_1: tathāgato brāhmaṇassa mogharājassa yāva tatiyaṁ pañhaṁ puṭṭho na byākāsi ‘evamimassa kulaputtassa māno upasamissati,
mil5.3.3:12.1_3: tena ca tassa kulaputtassa māno upasami,
mil5.3.3:12.1_4: mānūpasamā so brāhmaṇo chasu abhiññāsu vasībhāvaṁ pāpuṇi.
mil5.3.3:13.1_1: sunibbeṭhito pañho bahuvidhehi kāraṇehi, gahanaṁ agahanaṁ kataṁ, andhakāro āloko kato, gaṇṭhi bhinno, bhaggā paravādā,
mil5.3.3:13.1_2: jinaputtānaṁ cakkhuṁ tayā uppāditaṁ, nippaṭibhānā titthiyā,
